HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave za pakete ispod 50 € je 4.99 € (GLS). Dostava je besplatna za sve narudžbe iznad 50 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Proizvod će biti dostavljen kupcu u roku od 5 radnih dana (subota, nedjelja i neradni dani su isključeni) od trenutka otpreme proizvoda dostavnoj službi.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Cijena dostave za pakete ispod 50 € je 0.99 € (BOX NOW). Dostava je besplatna za sve narudžbe iznad 50 €.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery and parcel locker delivery within Croatia. 
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by GLS, and parcel locker delivery is handled by BOX NOW. 
PRICING: Delivery is free for all orders over 50 €. For orders below this threshold, GLS home delivery costs 4.99 €, and BOX NOW parcel locker delivery costs 0.99 €. 
DELIVERY TIME: Products are dispatched within 2 working days and delivered within 5 working days from dispatch. Deliveries are not made on weekends or holidays. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery is an available payment method for home delivery, with no surcharge mentioned. There is no information on express delivery, weekend delivery, or specific surcharges/restrictions for island deliveries. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms and Conditions) page. The information is clear but not on a dedicated, easily accessible page. It covers the main aspects like providers, pricing, and delivery times but lacks details on island delivery and express options.
